summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对象为的命令提供容器 。The class object provides the container for the commands of an . 访问的 属性将 检索 对象。Accessing the property of an retrieves an object. 应用程序可通过编程方式添加或删除命令。An application can programmatically add or remove commands. 类 通过类实现接口 。The class implements the interface through the class. ## Examples 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述。For a complete example, see the overview.

span.span: Introduction to the ObjectList Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的值为-1 `index` 指定将命令添加到集合的末尾。A value of -1 for the `index` parameter specifies that the command is added to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在只读界面中不可用 。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 对于应用此方法的所有类，可以使用方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，集合的 方法会 清除集合中的所有样式。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection. 对于 ，它会清除集合中的所有选项。For the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到对象列表的字段会更改控件的数据绑定行为，并要求您再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回命令的索引，该命令的 属性为 s 参数指定的字符串。Returns the index of the command whose property is the string specified by the s parameter. 如果在集合中找不到匹配项，则该 方法将返回-1。If matching items are not found in the collection, the method returns -1.
